M_Question.QuestionText: What is the purpose of Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIAs) according to the GDPR?
What principle does the GDPR emphasize concerning the design of systems and services?
Under what circumstances are organizations required to appoint a Data Protection Officer (DPO) according to the GDPR?
What does the GDPR stipulate regarding cross-border data transfers from the EU to countries lacking adequate data protection standards?
Besides access, rectification, erasure, and data portability, what additional rights are included for data subjects in the GDPR?
What is the timeframe specified by the GDPR for organizations to report data breaches to supervisory authorities?
What obligations do organizations have regarding accountability and documentation under the GDPR?
What does the GDPR entail regarding the processing of sensitive data categories?
What does the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) aim to regulate?
When did the GDPR become enforceable?
What rights does the GDPR provide to individuals regarding their personal data?
What obligations does the GDPR impose on organizations handling personal data?
How does the GDPR impact businesses that collect or process personal data?
What significance does GDPR compliance hold for organizations handling personal data?
What does the GDPR require from organizations located outside the EU that handle EU residents' personal data?
What is the overarching goal of the GDPR concerning personal data handling?
What role does GDPR compliance play in fostering relationships between individuals and organizations?
How does the GDPR impact entities located outside the EU?
What aspect of personal data handling does the GDPR primarily focus on?
What is the main reason for individuals and businesses to understand the GDPR?
